item.title: About
item.description: 32 Bytes is a small IT consultancy firm based in Stockholm, Sweden. We help our customers develop modern IT solutions that are secure, fast, and maintainable over time. Tech stack While we work well most modern tech stacks, there is tech that we prefer and default to when sensible. Cloud providers: We are familiar with most modern cloud providers, especially AWS, Google Cloud Platform and Heroku. Databases: Any SQL databases, including PostgresSQL, and SQLite.
